question: Amala Shankar, who passed away recently, was associated with which profession?
explanation:
Veteran Dancer Amala Shankar has passed away recently in Kolkata at the age of 101. She is the wife of classical dancer Uday Shankar.
She entered the profession at a very younger age and her first dance performance was in Belgium in the year 1931. She was active in the dance field till her 92nd year. She had won several awards and accolades including the West Bengal governmentâ€™s Banga Bibhusan award in 2011.
